name: Circle of the Moon
description: Guardians of the wilds who master powerful beast shapes.

2.name: Combat Wild Shape
2.description: Use Wild Shape as a bonus action and spend spell slots to heal while transformed.

2.name: Circle Forms
2.description: Transform into beasts with challenge rating up to 1, ignoring normal CR limits.

6.name: Primal Strike
6.description: Your attacks in beast form count as magical for overcoming resistances.

10.name: Elemental Wild Shape
10.description: Expend two uses of Wild Shape to transform into an air, earth, fire or water elemental.
